content: release date january 29th level beginner the festival beanie is a simple beginner-friendly ribbed hat designed with comfort and wearability in mind with straightforward construction and easy crown decreases it s perfect for beginners or anyone looking for a relaxing stress-free project designed to be worn your way fitted or slouchy it s a quick cozy knit you ll reach for again and again the pattern is written for malabrigo vientos and it s a one-skein project it includes instructions for two sizes s m and l xl in both fitted and slouchy versions you can find test knits and projects using the hashtag **#festivalbeanie** instagram **@kristelnc**
